```{r load lib and data}

library(tidyverse)


# read in CSV with summarized PSD to compare
psd_og <- read_csv("data/Df_analysis/All_deps_monthly_PSD.csv")

# pivot wider to create new df with one column per deployment-month combination
psd_wide <- psd_og |>
  # only keep data from months with at least half of the month represented
  filter(effort_days >= 0.5*days_in_month(month_UTC))|>
  # drop quantiles not using
  select(Dep_ID, month_UTC, effort_days, frequency, qmed)|>
  # new col names = Deployment_month_effortdays
  pivot_wider(names_from = c(Dep_ID, month_UTC, effort_days), values_from = c(qmed))




```
